source.query:
SELECT bidid
	   FROM ( SELECT a.bidid,
                CASE
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '11'::text THEN '서울특별시'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '41'::text THEN '경기도'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '28'::text THEN '인천광역시'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '42'::text THEN '강원특별자치도'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '44'::text THEN '충청남도'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '30'::text THEN '대전광역시'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '35'::text THEN '세종특별자치시'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '43'::text THEN '충청북도'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '26'::text THEN '부산광역시'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '31'::text THEN '울산광역시'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '27'::text THEN '대구광역시'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '47'::text THEN '경상북도'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '48'::text THEN '경상남도'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '46'::text THEN '전라남도'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '29'::text THEN '광주광역시'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '45'::text THEN '전라북도'::text
                    WHEN substr(b."상위 코드", 1, 2) = '50'::text THEN '제주특별자치도'::text
                    ELSE NULL::text
                END AS new_sido
           FROM cd_ods.tb_sf_eat_bid_master a
              JOIN ( SELECT *
                   FROM cd_ods.tb_mdm_school_info
                  WHERE 1 = 1 AND (tb_mdm_school_info."담당 기관 사업자번호" IN ( SELECT tb_mdm_school_info_1."담당 기관 사업자번호"
                           FROM cd_ods.tb_mdm_school_info tb_mdm_school_info_1
                          GROUP BY tb_mdm_school_info_1."담당 기관 사업자번호"
                         HAVING count(*) = 1))) b ON a.org_biz_id::text = b."담당 기관 사업자번호"
          WHERE 1=1
          and a.postdate between '2026-02-01' and '2026-02-28'
          ) unnamed_subquery
 	 WHERE new_sido <> ALL (ARRAY['서울특별시'::text, '경기도'::text, '인천광역시'::text, ''::text])

query.value:
insert into cd_ods.tb_sf_eat_order_detail_extracted
select * from cd_ods.tb_sf_eat_order_detail q 
where bidid = '@{item().bidid}'
AND NOT EXISTS (  
      SELECT 1  
      FROM cd_ods.tb_sf_eat_order_detail_keyword_except ke  
      WHERE (
      	 (q.name || ' ' || q.spec) ILIKE '%' || ke.keyword || '%'
         )  
         )
;

select 1 as success
